text.title: Connecticut ex-death row inmate Robert Courchesne dies
text.head: Connecticut ex-death row inmate Robert Courchesne dies
Sources

list.item: AP. "Expectant mom’s killer, once condemned, collapses and dies" — WTNH , February 3, 2015
